channel.title: Authors on Immunant, Inc
channel.description: Recent content in Authors on Immunant, Inc

item.description: Per is a co-founder and CEO at Immunant. He is a fan of the metric system and an avid collector of limited-edition plastic spoons.

Andrei is a co-founder and chief mad scientist at Immunant. He is an expert in compiler and linker based security techniques and a veteran C++ and Rust programmer. In his free time, he enjoys video gaming, critically-acclaimed TV series, and urban hiking.

Dan is a Staff Software Engineer at Immunant. He enjoys compiler, programming language, and video game design. In his free time, he likes to work on FOSS projects, play board/video games, and dabble in embedded hardware.
Stephen is a co-founder and CTO at Immunant. Amongst other topics, Stephen especially enjoys hacking on compiler-based systems security protections. He also loves games of all sorts.
